name: class-25
description: This guide outlines the basic steps to create a server using Node.js and Express.js. It covers setting up a `package.json` file, installing Express.js, defining routes for HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), using nodemon for development, and including a `.gitignore` file to exclude unnecessary files from version control. ref docs: https://expressjs.com/en/starter/basic-routing.html
